# Incremental Figure Numbers

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
fn = local({
  i = 0
  function(x) {
    i <<- i + 1
    paste('Figure ', i, ': ', x, sep = '')
  }
})
```

```{r}
#| label: test-a
#| fig.cap: !expr fn("this is one plot")
plot(1:10)
```

```{r}
#| label: test-b
#| fig.cap: !expr fn("another plot")
plot(rnorm(10))
```
